detail_desc: Top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front, narrow trims around the neckline and short sleeves with turn-ups.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam with an inset band at the waist and a tie detail at the front, and a balloon skirt. Unlined.
Fitted top in rib jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a wide neckline that is low-cut at the back.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Running gloves with uppers in windproof, functional fabric. Wide ribbing at the top with a reflective print. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material. Unlined.
Sunglasses with patterned acetate frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied in a fabric storage pouch.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Hair accessory with long rhinestone links that you can attach to your ponytail. Comb attachment.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front with a tie, and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs. Scalloped lace trim at the front.

Playsuit in heavily draping jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves and a gathered, elasticated seam and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a draped front, sewn-in ties at one side and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gently flared lower section.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with smocked sections, a V-neck with flounces at the top and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Small shoulder bag with a metal buckle at the front, three inner compartments and a narrow metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 4x11x15.5 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline and long sleeves.

Knee-length, V-neck dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave. Double-layered yoke with pleats at the top and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt under the bust and a flounce at the hem.

Cold shoulder blouse in an embroidered cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a frill trim at the top and short sleeves. Wide smocking at the waist and a peplum at the hem. Overlocked trims in a contrasting colour.

Patterned fancy dress costume with embroidered details and felt appliqués. Sleeveless top in solid colour jersey with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back and long legs. Padded section at the front in the shape of a dinosaur with handles at the top that have a hook and loop fastening. Detachable, padded tail at the back.
Knee-length dress in sturdy cotton jersey with frill-covered shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.
Hair clip with a large satin bow decorated with plastic beads and sparkly stones.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide ribbed cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in contrasting fabric front and back. Long sleeves with wide ribbing and thumbholes, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a zip down the front and along one leg, a lined hood with sewn-on ears, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in patterned satin with a collar, button placket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Unlined.
Long, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fastening with one button at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton pointelle jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and picot trims at the hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cropped, cold shoulder top woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a wide flounce at the top and spaghetti shoulder straps. Short puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication at the top and hems. Cotton lining.

Jacquard-weave blouse in softly draping viscose with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and wide cuffs, glittery embroidered trims around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back. The polyester content of the bikini top is recycled.
Blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Plastic Alice bands with cat ears.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Top in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbed trims. Gathers in the sides for best fit.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Hoodie in soft, fine-knit cotton with a text motif. Wrapover hood, long sleeves and a longer layer in a contrasting colour at the hem with short slits in the sides.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, pockets in the side seams and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neck, motif on the front and straight-cut hem.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Shorts in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with belt loops where the front ones can be unfastened, a zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable hook and loop tab and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Flap patch pockets with a press-stud and a zipped lift pass pocket on one sleeve. Snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons. Lining and filling in recycled polyester.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in soft, airy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar, gathers around the neckline, covered buttons down the front to the hem and a seam with a tie belt at the waist. Long, wide raglan sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Unlined.
Shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Imitation suede sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy, and a rounded hem.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric with a visible seam at the waist, patch front pockets and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Lightweight trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and no buttons.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut pima cotton piqué top in a relaxed fit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Flared skirt in several layers of tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
